attributes.action: Require all public bodies to publish the wages of their staff
attributes.background: One of the problems with the gender pay gap is that it is so hard to police. If companies have to publish the wages of their staff it would be a lot easier to close the gender pay gap.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure whether you'd like all public bodies to be required to do this, as in the title of your petition, or whether you'd like all companies to have to do this, as in the main text of your petition. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/210067
